name: 2024 9th International Conference on Water Pollution and Treatment
content: PUBLICATION: Accepted and published papers can be published in International Journal of Environmental Science and Development (IJESD, ISSN:2010-0264) . The journal is now indexed by Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Electronic Journals Library, Crossref, ProQuest.
